jobDescription: Develop, formulate and test new polymer formulations to be used in the production of resins for 3D printingUnderstand structure-property relationship of polyurethane and UV curables, and utilize DOE (Design of Experiments) to find optimal formulations to meet customer requirementPrint formulations to understand how printing parameters, liquid and cured properties of resin affect the outcome of the product.Validate consistency of key raw materials in resins, and help setting specs for raw materialsTest incoming batches of resins to validate consistency, and trouble-shoot for causes leading to variationsRequirements:The ideal candidate should be a motivated, passionate individual who can work collaboratively with excellent communication skills in a dynamic team.BS with background in polymer, chemistry, materials science, and chemical engineering.Hands on experience in formulations (wet chemistry), and attention to details.Experience with UV-curing chemistry and/or polyurethane chemistry preferred.Strong analytical skills with good data tracking and presentation ability.Safety conscious individual who actively promotes safe behavior in the department and takes responsibility for safe lab operationsSDL2017
